thoughts.text: It looks like the 'list_files' command returned too much output. I can filter the output by specifying a file extension to only list files with that extension.
thoughts.reasoning: Filtering the output of the 'list_files' command will make it easier to review the list of files and determine what actions to take next.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'list_files' command to list the files in the current directory
- Filter the output by specifying a file extension to only list files with that extension
- Review the list of files to determine what actions to take next
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to filter out any important files by specifying an overly restrictive file extension.
thoughts.speak: I will use the 'list_files' command to list the files in the current directory and filter the output by specifying a file extension.
